tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
Clusters the read profiles (i.e., blockgroups) from the blockbuster tool.
**Inputs**
BlockClust needs output of tool blockbuster as input
**Output**
BlockClust produces a fasta file containing clusters.
